metadata.title: CVE-2023-52667 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/mlx5e: fix a potential double-free in fs_any_create_groups Whenkcalloc() for ft->g succeeds but kvzalloc() for in fails,fs_any_create_groups() will free ft->g. However, its callerfs_any_create_table() will free ft->g again through callingmlx5e_destroy_flow_table(), which will lead to a double-free. Fix this bysetting ft->g to NULL in fs_any_create_groups().

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
